Description: Winners are chosen based on a combination of offensive stats, including batting average, on-base percentage, and slugging percentage
Awarded to the player in each league with the highest batting average at the end of the regular season
an All-Star is a major career achievement, honoring top performers at the season's midpoint
Awarded to the best defensive player at each position in both leagues, as voted by coaches and managers
an annual award given to the top first-year player in both the American League (AL) and National League (NL), as voted by the Baseball Writers Association of America (BBWAA)
Award is the highest individual honor in Major League Baseball, given annually to one player in the National League and one in the American League
